In recent days, driving license filling locations
in Ho Chi Minh City
have always been overloaded because
people flocked to submit applications, most of them
afraid of hearing rumors.  If you do not
change your old driver's license to a new one, you will be
fined
at a driver's license exchange point in
Tan Phu district. Many people come from 7 or 8 a.m.
to get their order number, but by 3 p.m., it's
still not their turn.  Even
if you do it quickly, it's still hard. According to the Department of
Transportation, the City last week
received more than 1,500 applications for changing
driver's licenses, an increase of more than 10 minutes compared to normal days.
Currently, the authorities only encourage
changing driver's licenses from paper to paper.  Plastic cards, but
there are no regulations forcing people to
use them, will not be considered an
administrative violation by the authorities, so as not to
put pressure on the competent authorities
as well as on people's travel.  I
also hope that the people will be
very calm. If it is not
really necessary, we should
not go and change the plan that early
next week the department will arrange two more points to receive
people's case files.  If you want to
change your driver's license to a PET card, you can
register an application via hotline
0281081 to receive instructions to reduce
waiting time and effort.
Today, the Ho Chi Minh City joint venture team will
check the prevention work.
Construction fires in many apartment buildings and
accommodation establishments in notable areas in
Binh Thanh district, the working group inspected and noted a
serious violation of fire prevention and fighting in a house with sleeping boxes for rent.
According to the fire, the house has a ground floor and four floors, with a
total area of ​​about 516 square meters. Each floor has
25 to 30 sleeping boxes installed. The first floor
is where the tenant's motorbike is parked, with a
total of 100 to 25 sleeping boxes. Each box is 2
to 2 inches wide.  The 3-square-meter apartment is designed with aluminum and is
only for sleeping, the rental price for each room is
about 2.2 million VND per month. The
inspection team representative said that this facility
seriously violated fire prevention and
did not ensure the safety standards.  Factors such as
escape routes, escape corridors,
fire protection system equipment, and fire protection systems. In
addition, the group also discovered a number of
cases where tenants had not declared their
residence and had built violations of some items of the
members in the project.  The delegation discussed
and agreed to temporarily suspend the operation of
this facility to have a
solution related to the case of six crocodiles
escaping into the lake at An Hoa cultural park,

management board.  The park said it had
caught two crocodiles and was using every
means to catch the remaining four
around 8:00 this morning in the lake area of

workers gathered around by canoe.  The
remaining people
used electric shock to electrocute the crocodiles that escaped from the cage.
Up to now, the unit
has caught two of the six

18 kg.  During the epidemic, the barns were

city.  Ho Chi Minh City has just successfully performed surgery to
remove blood from the liver area for a newborn baby
only 6 days old. This is a
very rare case of the disease that the
world medical literature has only recorded a few
cases in the gestational week.  22nd Through ultrasound, the
doctors discovered a fatty lump in the
baby's liver area. Two days after birth, the baby
was transferred to the hospital for
monitoring and treatment here. The doctors
decided to perform surgery.  When the baby was just
6 days old, the baby's liver and abdominal wall were so
thin that the liver was already big and
bloody. It was right under the
belly, which was very large and only needed a small force
to act on it.  The baby's abdominal wall is
either broken or broken, or if
it's bleeding inside, it's
too tight and it will burst, and
when it breaks like that, it means
death later.  After 112 minutes, the doctors
successfully removed the fatty liver tumor from the baby's liver, which
weighed up to half a kilogram and accounted for more than 1.5 of his
body weight. After two weeks of surgery, the
baby's weight increased to nearly 3 kg. This is a
good sign.  Make your
baby's recovery well after treatment

This species
originates from Southeast

Ho Chi Minh City, announced that they had arrested

a number of robberies during his time.  Recently
in Ho Chi
Minh City, on July 22,
Phu Nhuan district police received a report
from a resident in the area who was
stabbed in the stomach by a young man who loved a sharp object and
threatened to steal his cell phone.
Police investigation determined Tam was a
suspect, but Tam fled to Lam
Dong province. On the night of October 10, the subject returned
to Ho Chi Minh City and was
arrested by the Chinh Sap team at the police station.
Tam confessed.  robbery in
Phu Nhuan district and a motorbike theft
in Binh Thanh district. This subject also
has three criminal records and one criminal record.

last night, a house on
Nguyen Khoai Street, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi had a
fire inside the house with five people and
luckily all of them escaped.
Hoang Mai district police received information
at about 11:12 p.m. and sent two fire suppression vehicles
to the scene. Immediately afterward,
Hai Ba Trung district police also quickly
sent two more specialized vehicles to quickly put out the
fire.  extinguish the fire. The scene of the fire was
a 30 m square house with four floors, one
mezzanine and one bowl. At the time of the fire, there
were five people in the house. Four people escaped on their own while
one person was trapped on the B floor and was rescued
to a safe place later.  After about 20 minutes, the
fire was completely controlled and did not
spread to adjacent houses.
Initial information was that the fire area was about 60 square meters
including the entire first floor and mezzanine. Property damage
included three motorbikes and three air conditioners.  some information
and other information,
Hoang Mai district police are protecting the scene and
investigating the cause of the fire.
Ngu Hanh Son district police, Da Nang city, have just
discovered and caught a
person transporting dozens of empty laughing gas cylinders.
clarifying the origin and expanding the search at
two other locations, the force discovered and
confiscated many more laughing gas cylinders of
specific types on the afternoon of October 12. The
authorities conducted a secret ambush and
caught a subject driving a vehicle.
truck transporting 40 laughing gas cylinders
Continuing the struggle, two working groups

and 18 Vo Binh, all of which were
without prescriptions.  Documents proving
origin at the police station.
The subject declared that he bought the above amount of laughing gas
via the social network Facebook, then
transported it, hid it, and resold it to
customers in need to make a
profit. City Police  Da Nang City has just
arrested Ngo Vang Long, born in
1996, residing in Phu Yen province, for
appropriating money at ATMs in the area.
Around 5:00 p.m. on October 12 when
the subject was committing a
crime.  In Cam Le district, he was
approached by a detective from the criminal police department and invited him back to
his office. Long confessed that in order to have
money to spend, he approached ATMs when
someone came to withdraw money using the Qia code on the
subject's phone.  Use technology
to type and copy
transaction code and OTP information on the customer's device,
then log in to withdraw
money at the ATM next to you with the
above method. Long has carried out four cases in Da
Nang.  Appropriating more than 6 million VND,
he previously committed two cases in

according to the spokesman.  United Nations
stepan duer the area ordered to evacuate has

on
Gaza.  Ben Cat town,
Binh Duong province is investigating a
traffic accident between a car and a motorbike that occurred this
afternoon, killing a young man.
Around 2:30 pm this afternoon, a young
man was riding a motorbike on N5 road in the industrial park.
My Phuoc 1, The Hoa Ward,
Ben Cat Town, had a collision with a
car traveling in the same direction that was showing signs of turning
left quickly to turn around, and it hit so hard
that the young man was thrown high and
fell right in front of the car.  Suddenly, a car
sped up and swept the young man
under it, then dragged it for more than 5 meters and crashed into
the sidewalk. The victim lying under the bed was
helped by people to pull him out and was taken to
the hospital, but he later died.  The
police were present to examine the scene and
investigate the cause. It was known that
vehicles were being turned around on this part of the road.
